Class QATableRow

java.lang.Object
application.QATableRow
public class QATableRow extends Object
The QATableRow class is a wrapper used for dynamically representing rows in a table that displays questions, answers, and reviews.

It encapsulates the type of the row, the text content to be displayed, the unique content ID, the author's ID (if applicable), and any related IDs.

  • Constructor Details

    • QATableRow

      public QATableRow(QATableRow.RowType type, String text, Integer contentId, List<String> relatedId)
      Constructs a QATableRow with a row type, text content, a content ID, and a list of related IDs.

      This constructor is used when the author ID is not available.

      Parameters:
      type - the type of row (QUESTION, ANSWER, or REVIEW)
      text - the text content to display
      contentId - the unique content ID (e.g., question, answer, or review ID)
      relatedId - a list of related IDs

    • QATableRow

      public QATableRow(QATableRow.RowType type, String text, Integer contentId, Integer authorId, List<String> relatedId)
      Constructs a QATableRow with a row type, text content, a content ID, an author ID, and a list of related IDs.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of row (QUESTION, ANSWER, or REVIEW)
      text - the text content to display
      contentId - the unique content ID (e.g., question, answer, or review ID)
      authorId - the ID of the author of the content
      relatedId - a list of related IDs

    • QATableRow

      public QATableRow(QATableRow.RowType type, String text, Integer contentId, Integer authorId)
      Constructs a QATableRow with a row type, text content, a content ID, and an author ID. No related IDs are provided.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of row (QUESTION, ANSWER, or REVIEW)
      text - the text content to display
      contentId - the unique content ID (e.g., question, answer, or review ID)
      authorId - the ID of the author of the content

  • Method Details

    • getQuestionId

      public Integer getQuestionId()
      Gets the question ID. In this implementation, the question ID is equivalent to the content ID.
      Returns:
      the question ID.

    • getAnswerId

      public Integer getAnswerId()
      Gets the answer ID. In this implementation, the answer ID is equivalent to the content ID.
      Returns:
      the answer ID.

    • getReviewId

      public Integer getReviewId()
      Gets the review ID. In this implementation, the review ID is equivalent to the content ID.
      Returns:
      the review ID.

    • getAuthorId

      public Integer getAuthorId()
      Gets the author ID associated with this row.
      Returns:
      the author ID, or null if not provided.

      Returns:
      the content ID.
